rs all emphasize the Bible = inerrant; "high regard" is seriously misleading

I removed the phrase ", especially [[biblical inerrancy]]" from the point "* A high regard for [[biblical authority]] as inerrancy is not a membership requirement for the National Association of Evan.

Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/98.84.0.161|98.84.0.161]] ([[User talk:98.84.0.161|talk]]); Infallibility is what more liberal denominations might claim, whereas evangelicals generally still hold to inerrancy. ([[WP:TW|TW]])

"Infallibility is more precise to the general group of "evangelical Christians" that what God says is is infallible, whereas Biblical inerrancy is more specifically used to reference the original text
